Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Tamim Iqbal, no run, comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge to the leg side
Zulfiqar Babar to Tamim Iqbal, no run, full and coming on straight, tucked to midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Tamim Iqbal, no run, tucked to midwicket again
Zulfiqar Babar to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs, tucked to short midwicket for a brace
Zulfiqar Babar to Tamim Iqbal, no run, tucked off the backfoot to the leg side
Zulfiqar Babar to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs, stays in the crease and turns this away into the leg side, gets it just past the fielder at backward short leg
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, starts off with a wide delivery outside off and Kamran has to reach out for it as he taps it to covers
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, short and wide, slapped to sweeper cover
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, cut off the backfoot to cover-point as he sees width on offer
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, comes to the front foot to this length ball and defends to the cover-point fielder
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, tossed up on off, tries to sweep and gets beaten
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, punched off the backfoot down to wide long-on for an easy single
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, comes in with the arm and it is defended back to the bowler
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, swipes across the line at this tossed up ball and gets a leading edge back to the bowler
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, gets cramped for room and he mistimes the cut to covers
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, goes for a pull shot to this back of a length ball and wears it on the pad, sliding down leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, spinning away from middle and it is punched away to point
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, short of a length, fetches it from outside off and drags it to mid-on. And what do you know folks! Follows up a 11-ball first over with a maiden
Hasan Khan to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, length ball, stays in the crease and tucks off the pads to square leg
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, tossed up outside off, goes for the big drive and chips it just over the extra cover region
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, tossed up outside off and he drags this sweep from outside off to deep midwicket

Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, slog sweep from Kamran. Drops short in front of the deep midwicket boundary and almost stops short in its track as Zulfiqar runs across from deep square leg and picks it up
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, makes room for himself before laying into a cut shot. Not much room and he cannot beat point
Hasan Khan to Kamran Akmal, no run, short of a length, manufactures width and flays it out to covers
Mahmudullah to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, draws the batsman forward with a pitched up ball and Tamim gets an inside edge to the pad before the ball goes to short fine leg
Mahmudullah to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, too short and he uses the sharp turn to get down on one knee and pull it away with the turn to deep square leg. Just in front of square, actually
Mahmudullah to Kamran Akmal, SIX, tossed up on off, goes across and slogs it long and clean over cow corner. Similar to the one Ross Taylor plays
Mahmudullah to Kamran Akmal, no run
Mahmudullah to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, knocks it with the turn to mid-on for a quick single

Mahmudullah to Tamim Iqbal, no run, presses forward and pushes this one into the off side. The ball goes square of the wicket and point runs in and picks it up as Tamim is sent back, looking for a run
Mills to Kamran Akmal, no run, starts off with a short ball, bounces steeply but not called a wide
Mills to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short ball, takes is eyes off the ball as he tried to pull it, got hassled for pace and the ball goes to deep square leg
Mills to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, full and outside off, holding its line, Tamim leans forward and crunches a front foot drive to extra cover

Mills to Kamran Akmal, 1 leg bye, tries to tuck this fuller ball into the leg side and misses, wears it on the pad instead as the ball rolls away into the leg side. Mills charges on the follow through to pick it up. And they take a leg bye. That ball was seriously quick, 146.4 clicks
Mills to Tamim Iqbal, no run, length ball outside off, Tamim plays inside the line and the bat hits the pad as the ball goes to the wicketkeeper. Stifled appeal for caught behind and not given
Mills to Tamim Iqbal, no run, fuller ball outside off, comes forward and crunches a drive to cover-point
Mahmudullah to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, gets down to sweep to short fine leg. Only one shouts the keeper and one it will be

Mahmudullah to Tamim Iqbal, OUT, that was kind of a needless shot to attempt after a good start in pursuit of a low total. Comes charging down the track and does not account for the spin at all. Gets beaten as he sticks his bat out in the channel outside off and gets beaten. Keeper does the rest
Wicket: ['Tamim Iqbal st †Sarfraz Ahmed b Mahmudullah 7 (13b 0x4 0x6) SR: 53.84']

Commentary: Mahmudullah to Samuels, no run, comes a long way forward and tries to flick it away but wears it on the pad. Big turn, would have taken it down leg
Mahmudullah to Samuels, 1 run, goes for a slog and gets an inside edge to backward square leg
Mahmudullah to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short of a length and drifting in, swivels around and pulls it away to deep fine leg and the ball is cut off by the backward square leg fielder running across
Mahmudullah to Samuels, SIX, comes down the track to meet the pitch of it and dispatches it over long-on. That was given an absolute thump, made a nice, loud sound as ball crashed into willow
Mills to Kamran Akmal, no run, fuller, tries to drive and gets an inside edge to mid-on

Mills to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, fuller ball, Akmal's bat face closes as he drills it through midwicket and there is a bit of a yes and no on the second run as Pietersen charges across from mid-on. He picks up the ball and throws it to Sarfaraz. And the keeper, for some sane reason, does not try to break the stumps. Had he tried to flick it back and hit the stumps, the batsman would have been well short. Think that is what Pietersen is telling his captain
Mills to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, worked away through square leg

Mills to Samuels, OUT, what a catch! Samuels has another disappointing night. Amin was the substitute fielder, fielding close-in at forward short leg. Samuels tries to fend this short of a length ball off the hips. It is angled in on the body and he tries to flick it away, it hits the splice and seems to be flying over the forward short leg fielder but Yamin jumps up and back in a jiffy. Flew like a spark and takes it single-handed. Electric!
Mills to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full and on the stumps, driven but cannot pierce the gap
Wicket: ['MN Samuels c sub (Umar Amin) b Mills 7 (4b 0x4 1x6) SR: 175.00']

Commentary: Mills to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full and angling in on the pads, cannot make contact as he tries to clip it away. They don't make an appeal as that was clearly heading down leg

Mohammad Nawaz to Kamran Akmal, OUT, appeal for lbw and given. Kamran gets down to sweep and the ball is not full enough to sweep. It is on a length and he misses the ball, gets hit on the pad. Seems to be hitting in front of middle and leg. Kamran does not seem happy for some reason as he trudges off. Wicket off the first ball for Nawaz. He got a glove on that, actually
Mohammad Nawaz to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, fetches a sweep from outside off and luckily for him it does not spin back enough and he works it out in front of square
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, flays it to mid-off with a flat bat and Ahmed Shehzad makes a diving save
Wicket: ['Kamran Akmal lbw b Mohammad Nawaz 26 (30b 1x4 1x6) SR: 86.66']

Commentary: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, oh, dear! Peshawar are unravelling here. Mix-up sees the back of Shakib. Hafeez pushes it to cover-point off the front foot. Shakib takes off for the run and Hafeez comes down a few steps before sending Shakib back but he has come down way too far and he has to go back. Too late, but
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, knocks it to mid-on with a closed bat face
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, defended off the backfoot
Mahmudullah to Sohaib Maqsood, no run, defended to the bowler

Mahmudullah to Sohaib Maqsood, OUT, Maqsood gone and this Peshawar are sliding drastically here. Tries to go inside-out from the crease but fails to get to the pitch of the ball. The ball goes in the air to extra cover where Shafiq jumps up to snaffle a good, sharp catch. That came to him quickly but he did well there

Mahmudullah to Sammy, OUT, and what does he do! Holes out to long-off first ball. Tries to loft the spinner down the ground but he only gets the elevation, not the distance. Probably went off the bottom part of the bat and Nawaz runs to his right from long-off to snaffle it in front of the straight boundary. Irresponsible shot from the captain, and Sammy goes right back from where he came

Mahmudullah to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, oh my, oh my! Nearly had the hat-trick. What drama! Afridi comes down the track to this full toss and does not get hold of the shot as he lofts it over mid-off. Long-off comes running in and dives forward and the ball falls inches, just inches in front of him. Got to wonder, why would you play that kind of a shot off a hat-trick ball
Mahmudullah to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run
Mahmudullah to Shahid Afridi, no run, shuffles across to flick and ends up nudging it to midwicket as it comes on too close to him
Wicket: ['Sohaib Maqsood c Asad Shafiq b Mahmudullah 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, short of good length, sits up nicely and it's a slow surface so he has ample time as the ball comes on to him slowly and he whips it away off the backfoot to deep midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, length ball, spinning away, Hafeez is slightly opened up as he defends it
Wicket: ['DJG Sammy c Mohammad Nawaz b Mahmudullah 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, length ball on off, pushed into the off side

Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, gets it just over the fielder at midwicket. Mahmudullah it is. Short ball and it is pulled off the backfoot, clips the fingers of Mahmudullah as the ball goes to the boundary. Dropped chance but a very tough one
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full on off, fends it off to midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, gives it too much air and bowls a full toss that is pushed down to long-on for an easy single
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, short again and they are not learning from their mistakes. can't be bowling there. pulled away into deep midwicket
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, flatter and short outside off, cut to point
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, floated up and drifting in with the arm, clipped off the toes to midwicket as he comes forward
Hasan Khan to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, short of good length and spinning away outside off, slapped uppishly out to sweeper cover. Picks the vacant spaces in the covers region
Hasan Khan to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, loopy and flighted, sliding in with the arm, nudged to mid-on with soft hands. That was a tad quicker too
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short again but this one does not sit up as much and it is pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, floats it up and pitches it up outside off and Hafeez come sforward and pushes it into the off side

Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, goodness, how much did that turn! slower through the air and on a length. Draws the batsman forward and Hafeez gets beaten as there is spitting turn and bounce
Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, cut to point from the crease
Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, goes full and drifts it in with the arm and it is clipped away behind square

Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, Afridi advances down the track and goes hard as he tries to slog it away. But the drift in this delivery takes it in to the right-hander and he gets an inside edge as the ball goes to deep midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short ball, comes on at a comfortable pace and it is pulled to deep midwicket for an easy single
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, spinning awya outside off from a length, blocked off the backfoot and he drops it in front of covers. Tries to take a quick single but Afridi is not interested
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, fuller, driven off the front foot to covers
Hasan Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short and wide, intercepts the cover-point fielder with the cut
Hasan Khan to Shahid Afridi, no run, Afridi plays watchfully at this length ball as he blocks into the off side
Hasan Khan to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, and as soon as he sees some width outside off, he opens up his arms and flays this cut shot to sweeper cover. Fumble by Mills allows the second run
Hasan Khan to Shahid Afridi, no run, fuller ball, driven watchfully off the front foot to covers
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, pitched up outside off, strides across and pushes it into the vacant covers region and they take the single by the time point can run across
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, drifting in with the arm on leg stump, Afridi pushes it into covers for a sharp single
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, short and some width on offer, opens the face of his bat and carves it to short third man
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, floated up and loopy full ball, draws the batsman forward and he watchfully drives to the off side
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, comes down the track and converts it into a half-volley. Gets on top of the bounce and drills it out to long-off

Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Afridi, SIX, down the track comes Afridi. Does not seem like he has middled it but such is the power of the man. Goes high and straight and the ball has been dispatched over the boundary
Mills to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, good length and good pace - 141.8 kph - outside off, flays hard and gets beaten as he fails to slap it away
Mills to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short ball, sits up nicely for Hafeez who pulls it through square leg. Man guarding the fence, so there will only be one
Mills to Shahid Afridi, no run, tries to stay legside of the ball and force it through the off side but gets beaten as the ball tails in late
Mills to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, fuller and angling, clipped off the pads to square leg and midwicket runs across to pick it up
Mills to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, nice change-up in pace. Slower and outside off, fullish length, defended with soft hands back to the bowler

Mills to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, slashes at this short and wide ball outside off and there is some steep bounce on that. Extra bounce accounts for him as the ball finds the edge on its way to the keeper. The noise was clear and Hafeez is off walking even before the finger can be raised
Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, length ball on off, makes room and squirts it through covers
Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, no run, drifting in on a fullish length on leg stump, tries to go big over the leg side and gets an inside edge. Got yorked and the ball goes to the keeper

Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, no run, gets down to slog and this one is shorter than he would have liked and spins away sharply. Gets beaten. Cannot understand this approach when he should be looking to turn the strike over with Afridi at the other end
Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, length ball, stabs it to long-off with a flat bat
Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Afridi, SIX, follows the batsman with a fuller ball thayt drifts in and Afridi swings hard and dispatches this low full toss into the long-on stands
Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, made room early. Zulfiqar makes the adjustment and fires it outside off, throws his bat at it and gets it through covers. Full toss again
Wicket: ['Mohammad Hafeez c †Sarfraz Ahmed b Mills 22 (33b 3x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Afridi, FOUR, gets it to slide in with the arm. Afridi moves away to make room and exposes all three stumps. The bowler follows him and he makes the most of the angle to launch it down the ground as the ball crosses the boundary on the bounce

Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Afridi, SIX, it's the same thing again. Afridi makes room for himself and stays leg side. The bowler overadjusts and ends up bowling a half-volley, right under Afridi and he is able to use the angle and launches it over cow corner and this one sails clean over the fence

Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, what a shot that is. Afridi moves the other way this time to protect off-stump and he plays a half-sweep, half-scoop as the ball goes off the top-edge to backward square leg. Saad Nasim, the substitute fielder, cannot get to it as he runs back. Very tough chance
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Afridi, 1 run
Mohammad Nawaz to Wahab Riaz, no run, tries to make room and slap this short ball but is beaten by the extra pace and makes no contact
Mohammad Nawaz to Wahab Riaz, no run, goes for a wild slog sweep and this one pitches on middle and spins away a mile outside off. Nowhere near the ball is Wahab and he gets comprehensively beaten

Mills to Shahid Afridi, no run, great delivery. Fires a length ball in the corridor outside off, a stump or two outside off and Afridi tries to run it down to third man with an open bat face. Extra pace gets him beaten
Mills to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, slower full ball, works it with the inward angle to short fine leg

Mills to Wahab Riaz, OUT, gone, Wahab's gone. And his chancy stay comes to an end. Gets a feather as he slashes at this one from a long away. He is nowhere near this ball outside off as he was staying legside of it. Swings wildly and gets an outside edge for his troubles that his held comfortably by the wicketkeeper
Mills to Hasan Ali, no run, pushes him back by generating pace. It's short of a length and the batsman jumps back to ride the bounce before bunting it straight back to the bowler

Mills to Hasan Ali, FOUR, what a shot! That is a glorious cover drive. Is that the shot of the night or what! Full ball just outside off, right in the slot for Hasan and he lays into a cover drive. Sarfaraz watches it and grimaces. Half-volley outside off and what a time to be playing that shot. Glorious

Mills to Hasan Ali, FOUR, lucky boundary. Bowls it at good pace and that proves to be the undoing of Mills here. Short and outside off. Hasan slashes hard and swings wildly. The ball takes the top edge and it goes over the third man region, one-bounce and into the boundary. What a spell this was from Mills and it has gone horribly wrong in the last two balls

Mahmudullah to Shahid Afridi, FOUR, short and wide outside off, poor delivery. Afridi moves towards room to make himself room and crashes it square of the wicket, through backwar dpoint and into the boundary

Mahmudullah to Shahid Afridi, FOUR, and that will be the game. What a heist from Zalmi. And Afridi the man. He never ceases to amaze and he has played a superb innings and pulled a rabbit out of the hat here. Slightly short of good length outside off and Afridi slaps it past the diving cover-point fielder
